Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> eighteen, <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4444>tower<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4611>Siloam<s%> <S%G4098>fell,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G615>slew<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> ye <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>they<s%> <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G3781>sinners<s%> <S%G3844>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> that <S%G2730>dwelt<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> Jerusalem? <S%G2419><s%>

He <S%G3004>spake<s%> <S%G1161>also<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable;<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G2192>had<s%> a fig <S%G4808>tree<s%> <S%G5452>planted<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G290>vineyard;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G2590>fruit<s%> thereon, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> none. <S%G3756><s%>

And <S%G2579>if<s%> <S%G3303>it<s%> <S%G4160>bear<s%> <S%G2590>fruit,<s%> well: and if <S%G1490>not,<s%> then after that <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3195><s%> thou shalt cut it down. <S%G1581><s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath.<s%>

And, <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G769>infirmity<s%> <S%G1176>eighteen<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> bowed <S%G4794>together,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> in no <S%G3361>wise<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3838><s%> lift <S%G352>up<s%> herself.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> he <S%G4377>called<s%> her to him, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>her,<s%> Woman, <S%G1135><s%> thou art <S%G630>loosed<s%> from <S%G4675>thine<s%> infirmity. <S%G769><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> on <S%G846>her:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she was made <S%G461>straight,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> with <S%G23>indignation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2323>healed<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> sabbath <S%G4521>day,<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> There <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> men <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2038>work:<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5025>them<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G2323>healed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> this <S%G5026>woman,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> a <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> hath <S%G1210>bound,<s%> <S%G2400>lo,<s%> these eighteen <S%G1176><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3638><s%> years, <S%G2094><s%> be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1199>bond<s%> on <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day? <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G480>adversaries<s%> were <S%G2617>ashamed:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G5463>rejoiced<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> glorious <S%G1741>things<s%> that were <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of mustard <S%G4615>seed,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2983>took,<s%> and <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G2779>garden;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G837>grew,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1096>waxed<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1186>tree;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4071>fowls<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>air<s%> <S%G2681>lodged<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2798>branches<s%> of it. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Whereunto <S%G5101><s%> shall I <S%G3666>liken<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

It <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G2219>leaven,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> a <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G1470>hid<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G4568>measures<s%> of <S%G224>meal,<s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3757><s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> was leavened. <S%G2220><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1279>went<s%> <S%G2596>through<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>journeying<s%> <S%G4197><s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall ye <S%G756>begin<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> We have <S%G5315>eaten<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4095>drunk<s%> in thy presence, <S%G1799><s%> <S%G4675><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thou hast <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> streets. <S%G4113><s%>

But <S%G2532><s%> he shall <S%G2046>say,<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4159>whence<s%> ye <S%G2075>are;<s%> <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> ye <S%G2040>workers<s%> of iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

There <S%G1563><s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2805>weeping<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1030>gnashing<s%> of <S%G3599>teeth,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> ye shall <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2464>Isaac,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2384>Jacob,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> yourselves <S%G1544>thrust<s%> out. <S%G1854><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they shall <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G395>east,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G1424>west,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1005>north,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> from the <S%G3558>south,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall sit <S%G347>down<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2316>of<s%> God.

The <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> there <S%G4334>came<s%> <S%G5100>certain<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> Get thee <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4198>depart<s%> <S%G1782>hence:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G615>kill<s%> <S%G4571>thee.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> ye, and <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G5026>that<s%> <S%G258>fox,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> I cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I <S%G2005>do<s%> <S%G2392>cures<s%> <S%G4594>today<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> day I shall be perfected. <S%G5048><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G4133><s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G4594>today,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G839>tomorrow,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> day following: <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> it cannot be <S%G1735><s%> <S%G3756><s%> that a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G622>perish<s%> <S%G1854>out<s%> of Jerusalem. <S%G2419><s%>

O <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> which <S%G615>killest<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3036>stonest<s%> them that are <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>thee;<s%> how <S%G4212>often<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I have gathered thy children together, <S%G1996><s%> <S%G4675><s%> <S%G5043><s%> as <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> a <S%G3733>hen<s%> doth gather <S%G1438>her<s%> <S%G3555>brood<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> not! <S%G3756><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G863>left<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> desolate: <S%G2048><s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G281>verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> Ye shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> until <S%G2193><s%> <S%G302><s%> the time <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> ye shall <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2127>Blessed<s%> is he that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
